attacks.name: Burning Icicles
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has any Fire Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Blizzard Burn
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.
